mens-tree-skippers-navy-night.description: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Der Tree Dasher ist ein bequemer und stützender Joggingschuh für Freizeitläufe. Er besteht aus luftig-leichten Eukalyptusfasern und bietet die optimale Dämpfung bei jedem Kilometer.
localizedDescription.en-AU: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-CA: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.

localizedDescription.en-US: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fiber. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Tree Dasher est une chaussure de course confortable et souple conçue pour les runs quotidiens. Conçue à partir de fibres d'eucalyptus légères et aérées, elle vous assurera une foulée avec un bon amortissement kilomètre après kilomètre.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Tree Dasher sono le nostre scarpe da running comode e di supporto pensate per correre tutti i giorni. Realizzate in fibra di eucalipto leggera e traspirante, assicurano la giusta ammortizzazione chilometro dopo chilometro.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Tree Skipperは、軽量で通気性の良いユーカリ繊維を使用したデッキシューズです。シルクのように滑らかな肌触りで、暖かい日のデイリー散歩やお出かけに最適です。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Tree Dasher는 편안함과 지지력이 뛰어난 러닝화로 데일리 러닝에 최적화된 신발입니다. 가볍고 통기성이 뛰어난 유칼립투스 나무 섬유로 만들어 장거리 러닝에도 편한 쿠셔닝을 자랑합니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Tree Dasher is een comfortabele en ondersteunende hardloopschoen, ontworpen voor alledaagse runs. Hij is gemaakt van lichte, ademende eucalyptusvezel en zorgt kilometer na kilometer voor een gedempte looppas.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 我们的桉树船鞋丝滑透气，对环境负责的取材方式，让你轻松穿行各种生活场景。

mens-tree-skippers-jet-black.description: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Der Tree Dasher ist ein bequemer und stützender Joggingschuh für Freizeitläufe. Er besteht aus luftig-leichten Eukalyptusfasern und bietet die optimale Dämpfung bei jedem Kilometer.
localizedDescription.en-AU: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-CA: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-EU: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-GB: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-NZ: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-US: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fiber. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Tree Dasher est une chaussure de course confortable et souple conçue pour les runs quotidiens. Conçue à partir de fibres d'eucalyptus légères et aérées, elle vous assurera une foulée avec un bon amortissement kilomètre après kilomètre.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Tree Dasher sono le nostre scarpe da running comode e di supporto pensate per correre tutti i giorni. Realizzate in fibra di eucalipto leggera e traspirante, assicurano la giusta ammortizzazione chilometro dopo chilometro.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Tree Skipperは、軽量で通気性の良いユーカリ繊維を使用したデッキシューズです。シルクのように滑らかな肌触りで、暖かい日のデイリー散歩やお出かけに最適です。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Tree Dasher는 편안함과 지지력이 뛰어난 러닝화로 데일리 러닝에 최적화된 신발입니다. 가볍고 통기성이 뛰어난 유칼립투스 나무 섬유로 만들어 장거리 러닝에도 편한 쿠셔닝을 자랑합니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Tree Dasher is een comfortabele en ondersteunende hardloopschoen, ontworpen voor alledaagse runs. Hij is gemaakt van lichte, ademende eucalyptusvezel en zorgt kilometer na kilometer voor een gedempte looppas.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 我们的桉树船鞋丝滑透气，对环境负责的取材方式，让你轻松穿行各种生活场景。

mens-tree-skippers-lux-beige.description: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.

localizedDescription.de-DE: Der Tree Dasher ist ein bequemer und stützender Joggingschuh für Freizeitläufe. Er besteht aus luftig-leichten Eukalyptusfasern und bietet die optimale Dämpfung bei jedem Kilometer.
localizedDescription.en-AU: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-CA: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-EU: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-GB: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-NZ: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fibre. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.en-US: The Tree Skipper is a better version of the boat shoe, made with lightweight and breathable eucalyptus fiber. Designed for everyday casual wear and perfect for warmer weather.
localizedDescription.fr-FR: La Tree Dasher est une chaussure de course confortable et souple conçue pour les runs quotidiens. Conçue à partir de fibres d'eucalyptus légères et aérées, elle vous assurera une foulée avec un bon amortissement kilomètre après kilomètre.
localizedDescription.it-IT: Le Tree Dasher sono le nostre scarpe da running comode e di supporto pensate per correre tutti i giorni. Realizzate in fibra di eucalipto leggera e traspirante, assicurano la giusta ammortizzazione chilometro dopo chilometro.
localizedDescription.ja-JP: Tree Skipperは、軽量で通気性の良いユーカリ繊維を使用したデッキシューズです。シルクのように滑らかな肌触りで、暖かい日のデイリー散歩やお出かけに最適です。
localizedDescription.ko-KR: Tree Dasher는 편안함과 지지력이 뛰어난 러닝화로 데일리 러닝에 최적화된 신발입니다. 가볍고 통기성이 뛰어난 유칼립투스 나무 섬유로 만들어 장거리 러닝에도 편한 쿠셔닝을 자랑합니다.
localizedDescription.nl-NL: De Tree Dasher is een comfortabele en ondersteunende hardloopschoen, ontworpen voor alledaagse runs. Hij is gemaakt van lichte, ademende eucalyptusvezel en zorgt kilometer na kilometer voor een gedempte looppas.
localizedDescription.zh-CN: 我们的桉树船鞋丝滑透气，对环境负责的取材方式，让你轻松穿行各种生活场景。
